practice_phrases.target: I like taking time to learn
I guess I do not have too much time

practice_phrases.known: 你有时间在明天之前帮我练习吗？
practice_phrases.target: do you have time to help me practise before tomorrow?

practice_phrases.known: 我不喜欢花太多时间来回答，因为我想很快完成
practice_phrases.target: I do not like taking too much time to answer, because I want to finish soon
